Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2008 09:49PM tina-of-lymphland wrote: Hi Chattie, massage is ok but not the deep tissue work.  Any deeper work to loosen muscles should only be done by your lymphedema therapist and then only to free them to allow the lymph fluids to move.  I have a bad back and also lymph fluid in the back all the time as I can't reach it.  I do skin brushing but it only helps so much.  I have constant spasm and some scar tissue in the shoulder area.  My therapist does kneeding and cross fiber friction work on the area to help break it up.  I also have a friend who is a LMT that I see once in awhile that does Swedish massage on me, she does my arm but only very very very lightly no deep work on any lymphedema part unless by your certified lymphedema therapist.  Massage does also help circulation so it may help but any deep work can aggravate the swelling and something like Rolfing could damage nodes. Tina

Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2007 01:27PM tina-of-lymphland wrote: Hi all I know my post is in reply to some older 2006 ones but have to add my comments on the weight lifting and the dragon boat racing recently in the news.  I know from my experience repetition such as raking leaves, vaccuming makes me swell more.  I always wondered how some people have lymphedema after cancer and others don't.  I broke my foot 2 years ago Feb, almost 3 years now, and the podiatrist explained a few things to me.  He said more than likely I was, get this, a primary lymphedema prone person who got lymphedema secondary from surgery!  Hows that one for you? Someone who actually could some up with a reason. So on these studies, we don't know the people studied, could they just have gotton le from the cancer/surgery and that's why they are ok to exercise and weight lift?  I have tons of thoughts on this. If any of you would like to join a lymphedema support group online, feel free to check my site out, www.lymphland.com the button to join the group is on the page.  We have lots of information on the site in other languages as well and a chatroom with live daily chats. No pressure, just thought some of you might be interested. I'm glad I found the message boards here, I've been on the site so many times and never noticed them! Nice to meet you all! Tina
